text.div:
HSPC Sensor Description value set

Select Intermountain Healthcare Sensor Description code system codes.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-sensorDescription defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
528235928 finger clipA device that clips onto a finger in order to measure oxygen saturation.
528235929 ear clipA device that clips onto an earlobe in order to measure oxygen saturation.
528235930 cloth flexible sensorA device made of cloth and adhesive that wraps around finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation.
528235931 foam extended wear sensorA device made of foam and adhesive that wraps around a finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation and intended for extended use.
528235932 reflectance sensorA device that attaches to a forehead with adhesive that measures oxygen saturation via light reflected off of the surface of the skin.

name: HSPC Sensor Description value set
description: Select Intermountain Healthcare Sensor Description code system codes.

concept.definition: A device that clips onto a finger in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device that clips onto an earlobe in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device made of cloth and adhesive that wraps around  finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation.
A device made of foam and adhesive that wraps around a finger, toe, or heel in order to measure oxygen saturation and intended for extended use.
A device that attaches to a forehead with adhesive that measures oxygen saturation via light reflected off of the surface of the skin.
